headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This is Not a Toy
content:
We all know it: the RC Bandito is the real MVP of Arena War, and now the little car with the big payload is all set to hit the streets of Los Santos.

Just head over San Andreas Super Autos to pick up your tiny bundle of explosive joy, and whether you own it or not, donâ€™t forget to put your skills to the test in the brand new RC Bandito Races.
